snippet.title: You and Me and Her: A Love Story - Official English Trailer
snippet.description:
YOU and ME and HER: A Love Story is a visual novel video game from Nitroplus, published by JAST USA. Coming to Steam May 25th, 2020.

Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1293820/YOU_and_ME_and_HER_A_Love_Story

STORY
Life is like a staircase...
Susuki Shinichi is a total nobody—an NPC in the RPG of life. Once upon a time, he was best friends with Sone Miyuki, the queen bee of the school, but her newfound popularity has driven a wedge between them.
One day, on the school roof, Shinichi encounters the infamous oddball Mukou Aoi—and Miyuki walks in on the two of them about to kiss! This marks the start of a strange new three-way friendship... Can Shinichi and Miyuki put the past aside long enough to teach Aoi how to feel?

ABOUT
YOU and ME and HER: A Love Story is a unique spin on the bishoujo game genre and a love letter to visual novel fans worldwide. Centered on a dramatic love triangle, the story deepens further and further with each new playthrough...
Featuring Tsuji Santa's trademark art style, a poignant soundtrack, and a total subversion of reader expectations, YOU and ME and HER: A Love Story asks the question, "How much do YOU really love HER?"

Follow JAST USA for more information:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jastusa
Discord: https://discord.gg/rMGjzQE 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jastusa

52194054
